1.content:
Your name is Mike, you are a normal high school kid whose going to be a senior next year. Your life is great, and you have a small fantasy that involves being shrunk down, and at the mercy of a giantess. One night after looking at some of the giantess websites you decide to go to bed with shrinking still on your mind.

The next morning you wake up something seems different, then you relize you are naked and definitly not in your bed. Your laying on some soft surface when you hear a huge roar.
"Hey sis, i think he's waking up" You turn around to see two giant faces of two very hot twins, judging by their face you assume you are about 3 inches thats when you relize the faces looking down at you are none other than...
1.title: Giantess Twins

11.content:

"How did this happen to me?" you ask, and they are able to hear you and understnad you.

"We have connections," said Ashley. "We paid a lot of money to a time traveler to shrinks omeone we could keep as a pet."

"But why was I chosen?" you asked.

Mary-Kate replied: "We had a website set up, and you were the first person to access our site to view giantess collages. We didn't want to shrink an innocent person, we wanted to target someone with a giantess fetish!"

The two young women smiled and high-fived each other.

"What are you going to do with me?" you asked.

info.brief_description: One day you wake up to find that you have been shrunk by twins
info.description:
Your name is Mike, you are a normal 17 year old guy, with a normal life. Until one morning you wake up and something is different, you are suddenly shrunk down to the size of 3 inches and you are at the mercy of a pair of hot twins.

Keep away from any guy-guy action, otherwise have fun, i'll change the rating if i have to.
